## Restaurant Information
Name: Dona Theresa
Type: Italian Restaurant
Established: 2011
Address: 451 Uxbridge Road, Hatch End, Pinner HA5 4JR, UK
Phone: 020 8421 5550
Website: https://donatheresa.com
Rating: 4.9★ Google, Featured on TripAdvisor, TheFork, Yelp
Parking: Free parking available for guests

## Opening Hours
Tuesday - Sunday: 12:00 - 15:00 (Lunch), 18:00 - 23:00 (Dinner)
Monday: Closed

## Core Pages
-[Home](https://donatheresa.com/):Dona Theresa homepage—award-winning Italian restaurant in Hatch End & Pinner with 4.9★ rating.
-[Menu](https://donatheresa.com/menu):Full Italian menu with starters, pasta, steaks, seafood, desserts and wine list.
-[A La Carte Menu](https://donatheresa.com/menu/a-la-carte):Premium à la carte Italian dining with signature dishes like Filleto Rossini.
-[Lunch Menu](https://donatheresa.com/menu/lunchtime-earlybird):Lunchtime & Early Bird menu—2 courses for £19.95, available Tue-Sun 12pm-3pm.
-[Book Table](https://donatheresa.com/reserve):Online table booking with instant confirmation. Lunch and dinner reservations.
-[About](https://donatheresa.com/about):Family-owned since 2011, authentic Italian cuisine with Portuguese hospitality.
-[Contact](https://donatheresa.com/contact):Contact details, location map, and enquiry form for Dona Theresa restaurant.

## Local Area Pages
-[Restaurants Pinner](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-pinner):Best Italian restaurant in Pinner—award-winning cuisine, local favourite since 2011.
-[Restaurants Hatch End](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-hatch-end):Top-rated Italian on Uxbridge Road, Hatch End with free parking.
-[Restaurants Harrow](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-harrow):Italian dining near Harrow—just 10 minutes from Harrow town centre.
-[Restaurants Northwood](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-northwood):Best Italian near Northwood—authentic pasta, steaks, and seafood.
-[Restaurants Ruislip](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-ruislip):Italian restaurant near Ruislip—easy access from Ruislip Manor.
-[Restaurants Watford](https://donatheresa.com/restaurants-watford):Italian dining near Watford—convenient location off the A41.
-[Lunch Pinner](https://donatheresa.com/lunch-pinner):Best lunch spot in Pinner—2-course Italian lunch £19.95.
-[Best Italian Near Me](https://donatheresa.com/best-italian-restaurant-near-me):Find the best Italian restaurant near you in Northwest London.

## Policies
-[Cookie Policy](https://donatheresa.com/cookie-policy):How Dona Theresa uses cookies for analytics and user experience.

## Key Features
- Authentic Italian cuisine with fresh, daily-sourced ingredients
- Signature dishes: Filleto Rossini, Spaghetti Pescatora, handmade pasta
- £19.95 lunch menu (2 courses) available Tuesday-Sunday 12pm-3pm
- Premium wine selection with 50+ Italian and international wines
- Free parking available for all guests
- Private dining and group bookings available
- 12+ years of culinary excellence in Northwest London
- Family-owned with Portuguese hospitality

## Cuisines Served
Italian, Mediterranean, Seafood, Steak, Pasta, Pizza

## Price Range
££ - Moderate (Lunch from £19.95, A la carte mains £15-35)

## Suitable For
Romantic dinners, Family celebrations, Business lunches, Special occasions, Group dining

## Contact
Phone: 020 8421 5550
Email: donatheresahatchend@gmail.com
